name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: Kyouteki! Dodge Senshi no Maki​
summary:
Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu: Kyouteki! Dodge Senshi no Maki​ is a dodge ball-based sports game produced by Technos Japan Corp.. It is the fourth Kunio-kun game released for Game Boy.

In this game, Nekketsu team facing against the rival teams in the tournament are composed of gangs of punks, robots and other types of characters.
